div.p: ANTONIO: The problem with high-risk drug and alcohol choices is that the good times can quickly turn into the not-so-good times.
ANTONIO: Here are a few of the problems that people experience. (Problems appear) Okay, so that's more than a few...
ANTONIO: But all of these problems basically fall into two categories: health problems and impairment problems.
ANTONIO: High-risk alcohol or drug use can lead to health problems like pancreatitis, liver disease, brain damage, some forms of cancer, and alcoholism or addiction.
ANTONIO: Most of these problems develop over months or years of high-risk use. But impairment problems like falls, fights...
ANTONIO: Getting arrested, losing a job, or crashing a car can happen in just one night of high-risk choices.
ANTONIO: All it takes is drinking enough to impair mental, physical, or emotional functioning.
ANTONIO: Later on, we'll learn who's at risk for both health and impairment problems...
GUY 1: Yo... You spilled my beer!
GUY 2: Yeah! I think your mom spilled your beer!
ANTONIO: We'll also learn how to prevent both health and impairment problems.
